home-hero-section.title: Unlocked & Connected
home-hero-section.subtitle: Decentralized worlds
home-hero-section.description: An interoperability protocol for the next generation of multi-chain assets & identities
home-hero-section.marquee: The next generation of multi-chain assets & identities

what-rarimo-does-section.title: Rarimo’s uniquely modular multi-layer architecture makes developing interoperable dApps faster, easier, and cheaper
what-rarimo-does-section.subtitle: What Rarimo does?
what-rarimo-does-section.description: The protocol consists of a generalized messaging protocol with a series of sub-protocols on top.
what-rarimo-does-section.easy-solutions-text: Transaction bundling allows multiple flows to be executed at once. Meaning fewer fees, signatures, and simplest experience for users.
what-rarimo-does-section.decentralized-network-text: Blockchain core and endless number of validators, no limit on the number of blockchains that can be connected.
what-rarimo-does-section.security-text: Threshold signatures ensure top-level security, and a constant transfer price guarantees affordability.

verticals-section.subtitle: Verticals
verticals-section.assets-text: From Defi Lending, to NFT Checkouts, Rarimo makes multi-chain transactions possible
verticals-section.identites-text: Cross-chain proofs for Soul-Bound Tokens, POAPs, dynamic NFTs and more. For interoperable social graphs and identities

use-cases-section.subtitle: Featured use cases
use-cases-section.nft-checkout-desc: With Rarimo, developers can build fully decentralized NFT checkouts with non-native tokens
use-cases-section.crosschain-proofs-desc: Verify the NFT / SBT ownership and easily retrieve the metadata stored on Rarimo
use-cases-section.multichain-minting-desc: Simplify the flow for airdropping and allow community to mint and hold tokens on their preferred chain

news-section.subtitle: Last news
news-section.second-title: What is Interoperability, and why is it so important?

subscribe-section.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
subscribe-section.description: Stay up-to-date about new features and supported apps & Games

community-section.title: Start building with Rarimo
community-section.description: Our community is here to help! Enjoy support tailored to the unique needs of your project
community-section.support-desc: Make your engineering workflow more efficient
community-section.discord-desc: Connect with like-minded community for support and inspiration

testnet-hero-section.title: Join private Testnet
testnet-hero-section.description_html: Rarimo is a protocol unlocking liquidity and interoperability across chains in a seamless way

testnet-desc-section.title: Rarimo will run a closed testnet that will be invite only, with participants chosen from the signups
testnet-desc-section.description: Looking for a diverse set of participants, with technical experience participating in testnets and running nodes, those who represent professional validating communities as well as developers, builders, community leaders and moderators.
testnet-desc-section.feedback: Post your questions and feedback on Rarimo’s

nft-checkout-hero-section.title: NFT purchase made
nft-checkout-hero-section.subtitle: NFT Checkout
nft-checkout-hero-section.description_html: Users can pay for NFTs with any token of their choice in a single transaction

advantages-section.experience-text: Choose a payment token from the available balance, sign once and redeem NFT
advantages-section.fee-text: Execute multiple events with a bundling functionality, for lowest fees and non reversible transaction

implementation-section.description: The react component connects seamlessly with your Dapp or a Marketplace
implementation-section.acceptable-text: Define acceptable chain & token for the marketplace
implementation-section.transaction-building-text: Transaction building, wallet signs are handled by the component
implementation-section.testing-mode-text: Testing & debugging modes for local development
